name: Fantasy Stock League
description: The Fantasy Stock League aims to destigmatize Investing and promote growth/learning amongst underrepresented communities. By creating this project, we strive to ensure that all people have access to a financial literacy that will assist in upward economic mobility for young people, minorities, and women. Created by Devon Wallerson, Michael Sun, Sean Bamfo, and Sulaiman Oyekunle.
stack: HTML/CSS, JavaScript, TIINGO API, Python - Pandas, MatPlotLib

name: Predicting House Prices
description: Implemented Python and Jupyter Notebook to formulate predictions of the median sale price of homes in the New York City Metro Area.
stack: Python - Jupyter Notebook, Pandas, Numpy, SciKit-Learn, Random Forest Classifier

name: Apple Music Library Web Analysis
description: Web Application that queries users' Apple Music Data through the Apple Music API and shows them statistics based on their library. Components are dynamic and change color based on the song chosen, and display song specific badges based on what playlists the songs are in.
stack: ReactJs, Bootstrap, Apple Music API, Node.js
